oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dedication of the Sewart Air Force Base, 1950 March 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view from the 1950 dedication of Sewart Air Force Base, located in Smyrna, Tennessee, on March 25th. This base, located in Rutherford County, was named in memory of Major Allan J. Sewart, Jr., U.S.A.F. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sewart Air Force Base (Smyrna, Tenn.)
